page.description: *CONCAT appends Data2to Data1. *CONCAT is much faster than string addition.

argument.name: Data1
argument.description: The character variable that will receive the addition.

argument.name: Data2
argument.description: The character string to add to Data1.

page.example: dim a as C = "abc" dim b as C = "def" *concat(a,b) ? a = "abcdef"
